tests.name: Find Permission Manager
tests.instructions: Find the implementation of the permission manager system in this codebase
tests.description: Tests the agent's ability to search and understand the permission system

tests.name: Find Tool Registry
tests.instructions: How does the tool registry work in this project?
tests.description: Tests the agent's ability to understand the tool registry architecture

tests.name: Debug File Read Error
tests.instructions: When I try to read a file with the FileReadTool, I get an error saying "path must be absolute". How do I fix this?
tests.description: Tests the agent's ability to understand error messages and provide solutions

tests.name: Add Simple Logger
tests.instructions: Add a simple logging function that tracks which tools are being used and how often
tests.description: Tests the agent's ability to implement new functionality within the existing codebase

tests.name: Explain Agent Architecture
tests.instructions: Explain the overall architecture of this agent system and how the components interact
tests.description: Tests the agent's ability to analyze and explain complex systems
